data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Jim Carrey is an Canadian-American actor and comedian. He is well known for starring in movies such as Ace Ventura, Dumb and Dumber and The Mask, as well as appearing on TV Shows like In Living Color. In January 2018, the movie star was cleared of playing a part in his ex-girlfriend Cathriona White's suicide after a wrongful death lawsuit was dismissed. Since the death of his Irish ex lover, Jim Carrey has been a complete recluse with fans having no idea of his whereabouts.
data.text: Jim Carrey is an Canadian-American actor and comedian. He is well known for starring in movies such as Ace Ventura, Dumb and Dumber and The Mask, as well as appearing on TV Shows like In Living Color. In January 2018, the movie star was cleared of playing a part in his ex-girlfriend Cathriona White's suicide after a wrongful death lawsuit was dismissed. Since the death of his Irish ex lover, Jim Carrey has been a complete recluse with fans having no idea of his whereabouts.
